summary: Use this call to search item
description: Use this call to search item.

query.name: cursor
query.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is "". If data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

query.name: page_size
query.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/get_comment?access_token=access_token&comment_id=120590834&item_id=16509872&page_size=10&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: response
schema.description: Detail informations you are querying.

schema.name: more
schema.description: This is to indicate whether the comment list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of comments. But only respond 500 comments at most through OpenAPI, if there are more than 500, this field "more" also respond "true".

schema.name: item_comment_list
schema.description: The comment data list of the items.

schema.name: order_sn
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

schema.name: comment_id
schema.description: The identity of comment.

schema.name: comment
schema.description: The content of the comment.

schema.name: buyer_username
schema.description: The username of the buyer who posted the comment.

schema.name: item_id
schema.description: The commented item's id

schema.name: model_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a model of an item. It will only return 0 now. Will be offline on 2024-12-27, please switch to use model_id_list.

schema.name: rating_star
schema.description: Buyer's rating for the item.

schema.name: editable
schema.description: The editable status of the comment. The value may be one of EXPIRED/EDITABLE/HAVE_EDIT_ONCE.

schema.name: hidden
schema.description: The comment is hidden or not.

schema.name: create_time
schema.description: The create time of the comment.

schema.name: comment_reply
schema.description: The reply of the comment.

schema.name: reply
schema.sample: Thank you for your support. Look forward to your next visit.
schema.description: The content of reply.

schema.name: hidden
schema.description: The comment reply is hidden or not.

schema.name: create_time
schema.description: The time the seller replied to the comment.

schema.name: model_id_list
schema.description: List of model id of the buyer's purchase corresponding to the comment.

schema.name: image_url_list
schema.description: List of image url uploaded by the buyer in the comment.

schema.name: video_url_list
schema.description: List of video url uploaded by the buyer in the comment.

schema.name: next_cursor
schema.description: If more is true, you should pass the next_cursor in the next request as cursor. The value of next_cursor will be empty string when more is false.
